work.summary: I was in charge of developing and maintaining several solutions, the main one being the TimbraXML billing web application. Besides gaining a lot of knowledge of frontend and backend web development, I learned what is a good workflow among a professional development team, supported by version control tools, progression boards and effective communication channels.
highlights: Deliver solutions web (PHP/CodeIgniter/JQuery) solutions for complex developments
Turn core processes into documented libraries with modern and readable syntax
Make flows with Git to avoid crashes between teammate's changes

work.summary: Originally tasked to be an assistant in technical support and server administration, I ended up doing all the engineering process to develop an Android application.
highlights: Gather and interpret information about the experience of using software by users with little or no computer knowledge
Used modern software design architectures (MVVM and observer pattern)
Reverse engineer an existing system to integrate it to another with zero documentation
Implemented a REST API with PHP and Laravel
Secured the requests with JSON Web Tokens

work.summary: Member of the development team and mentored by my chief Felix Amaya Valencia, from whom I quickly gained recognition and was assigned tasks of the same weight as those given to permanent members of the team. Working there taught me to have a larger scale vision of a system and to understand the importance of knowing a problem in depth before writing even a single line of code trying to solve it.
highlights: Design modules of the internal custom ERP system with C# Windows Forms.
Create the backend for my modules using T-SQL tables and stored procedures.

awards.title: HackSureste 2018
awards.summary: Awarded third place for creating a high-impact innovation project. It consists of a system to deliver restaurant orders directly from the diner table to the kitchen through voice commands.

publications.name: Costeapp
publications.summary: An offline-first Web application (React, RXDB, react-hook-form, Bulma) for costing estimations of cooking recipes.

publications.name: Asset validation application
publications.summary: An android application (Kotlin, Jetpack) to validate the existence of fixed assets with a QR code.

publications.name: FiestasMexicanas
publications.summary: A Windows Forms (C#, .NET) desktop application for quoting, order management and piñata production.
